title: Validation Result
description: Result of validating a single delivery record against a property list.

record_id.description: Client-provided ID from the delivery record (if provided)

status.description: Validation status: compliant (in list), non_compliant (not in list), unknown (identifier type not resolvable by this governance agent)

impressions.description: Number of impressions from this record

violations.description: Specific violations found (only present for non_compliant records)
